Params: {2: 'New Variant', 3: "D-did you think—defeating me... means you've won?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We're running out of able fighters... If we're to clash with them now...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We're running out of able fighters... If we're to clash with them now...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "If that's your decision, Commandant, let me be the first one to do it.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'New Variant', 3: 'Hehe, hehe! Come on! Come get me!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'New Variant', 3: "I've been waiting—for you to do this—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Plotting its course... it's heading toward coordinates (234, 124)—that's where Commandant is!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Analyzing its intention... It's activating self-destruct sequence!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Cough... cough... I-I think I have it worse...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I told you to stay back! You reckless piece of...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, your order this time is indeed a little too impulsive.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If the enemies had to self-destruct, I'm sure we've seen the last of them. Let's get Watanabe settled first.", 4: '1'}
